faqProductsAnswer: ExChange offers a complete suite of cryptocurrency trading services including spot trading with over 1000+ coins, futures trading with up to 125x leverage, grid trading for automated strategies, copy trading to follow successful traders, and a mobile app for trading on the go. We also provide advanced security features, fast deposits and withdrawals, and comprehensive educational resources.
faqSecurityAnswer: Yes, ExChange implements industry-leading security measures. We store 98% of assets in cold wallets, use Fireblocks' security infrastructure and Chainalysis for real-time monitoring, implement multi-level security systems including KYC verification and two-factor authentication (2FA). Our platform undergoes regular security audits and we maintain comprehensive insurance coverage to protect user funds.
faqBuyQuestion: How do I buy Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies on ExChange?
faqBuyAnswer: To buy cryptocurrencies on ExChange: 1) Create an account and complete verification. 2) Deposit funds via bank transfer, credit/debit card, or cryptocurrency transfer. 3) Navigate to the 'Buy Crypto' section. 4) Select the cryptocurrency you want to purchase and the amount. 5) Review and confirm your purchase. You can also use our advanced trading interface for more detailed order options or our mobile app for trading on the go.
faqTradeQuestion: How to trade cryptocurrencies on ExChange
faqTradeAnswer: Trading on ExChange is straightforward: 1) Log in to your verified account. 2) Ensure you have funds in your wallet. 3) Go to the 'Spot' or 'Futures' trading section. 4) Select a trading pair (e.g., BTC/USDT). 5) Choose your order type (market, limit, or advanced orders). 6) Enter the amount you wish to trade. 7) For futures trading, select your desired leverage. 8) Review and submit your order. You can also use grid trading for automated strategies or copy trading to follow successful traders.
